sys_script_include.name: invoiceItemChoice

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_ff559301974531102b9e76771153af78
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_427498_abis.invoiceItemChoice</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>invoiceItemChoice</name><script><![CDATA[var invoiceItemChoice = Class.create();
invoiceItemChoice.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	FilterChoiceList:function(company){
		
		gs.info("company" + company);

		var gr = new GlideRecord('x_427498_abis_invoice_item');
		var answer= [];
		//if company is = aanoor_global , return all the name related to it

		if(company == 'aanoor_global'){
			gr.addEncodedQuery('u_group_name=aanoor_global');
			gr.query();
	gs.info("I am here" + gr.sys_id);
			while (gr.next()){
				answer.push(gr.sys_id.toString());

			}
			
			return 'sys_idIN' + answer.join(',');
		}else if (company == 'aanoor_efilings'){
			
			gr.addEncodedQuery('u_group_name=aanoor_efilings');
			gr.query();
			
			while (gr.next()){
				answer.push(gr.sys_id.toString());

			}
			
			return 'sys_idIN' + answer.join(',');
			
		}
	

	},

	type: 'invoiceItemChoice'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-01 19:42:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>ff559301974531102b9e76771153af78</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>invoiceItemChoice</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ABiS" source="x_427498_abis">269ad56c47332110ff8e8a88536d4359</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ABiS">269ad56c47332110ff8e8a88536d4359</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ff559301974531102b9e76771153af78</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-01 21:57:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
